title: AnOtherMan
content:
Does somebody know the font in use by AnOtherMan Magazine?  
It's used both underlined and not.

thanks  
elena

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AnOtherMan_6007.jpg)
author: elena_m

comments.content:
Hi Elena,  
I’m curious, too. We [had this one before](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/typophile.com/node/50176):  
The masthead on the [AnOther Magazine website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/www.anothermag.com/) states that all its font design is by [Alias](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/www.alias.uk.com/) ( [Gareth Hague](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gareth%20Hague) and [David James](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20James)). This typeface isn’t listed on their site, so I’m afraid it is custom.

Related typefaces include [Nicola Kroita Zucka](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/www.pfadfinderei.com/font/nicola-kroita-zucka#/0), [Easyscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Script+Fonts/Easyscript/), [Terital](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/letterbox/terital_ot/?&sample_text=Poised%20in%20readiness).  
F

As there is another »Access denied«-page due to the buggy update of Typophile, here is the [Google-cache](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/209.85.135.132/search?q=cache:uJLXhQMXRCsJ:www.typophile.com/node/50176+site:typophile.com+50176&cd=1&hl=de&ct=clnk) for the link from Florian.

Thanks, Rainer.  
As I hope this is only a temporary issue, I had included that link for future reference and quoted the relevant bits above.

The typeface was designed for Issues 6 - 8 of Another Man, as a script version of our Ano typeface. Examples in use in the magazine at [http://alias.dj/#/archive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326195518/http:/alias.dj/#/archive "http://alias.dj/#/archive")  
Yes, it's unreleased.
